籤詩版本二:
I-jade exabisekileyo kunye nobutyebi obufihlwe etyeni bufunwa kuphela ngabantu basemzini abavela kwezinye iindawo.
Kanye njengokubamba isibane ukukhangela umlilo, kungcono ukucoca iinzame ezichithekileyo
詩意:
Le hexagram ibamba isibane kwaye ijonge uphawu lomlilo.
Yonke into iya kwenziwa ngexesha elifanelekileyo.
解曰: Intlanganiso yomtshato. Akukho nto inokwenziwa. Kufuneka ibe mda. Yinyani phambi kwamehlo am.
籤詩故事一:
◇UPang Juan ujonge ukuyilwa
Ngexesha leXesha lokulwa, uSun Bin wayeyinzalelwane yaseQi. UPang Juan wayeyinzalelwane yaseWei. Wayekwanqula uGu Guzi njengomfundisi-ntsapho wakhe.
U-Sun Bin wafunda ngcono kunePang Juan, kwaye uPang Juan waba yinjengele ye-Wei. Walwa no-Sun Bin kwidabi lengqondo, kwaye xa woyiswayo, wamthiya u-Sun Bin.
Wasebenzisa iqhinga lokumnqumla iinyawo uSun Bin, ethubeni uSun Bin wazenza ophambeneyo wakwazi ukubaleka.
UKumkani u-Wei waseQi wasebenzisa u-Sun Bin njengomcebisi wakhe emkhosini ukukhokela amajoni ukuba ahlasele i-Wei.
UPang Juan waya kwinkampu ye-Sun Bin ukuze ahlole ukubunjwa komkhosi. U-Sun Bin ukhohlise uPang Juan ngokwenza ngathi unciphisa imikhosi yakhe kwaye ngokufihlakeleyo wongeza amajoni amaninzi. UPang Juan wamsukela ukuya eMaling Road waza wadutyulwa wafa lijoni elalimlalele ngomnqamlezo.
(Isikweko seli bali kukuba nawe unesiphiwo, ngoko kutheni kufuneka umonele italente yakhe?)
聖意: Indlu ayimlungelanga umntu, kunzima ukufumana imali, kunzima ukurhweba, kunzima ukutshata, kunzima ukuba umhambi webhinqa ahambise intsimi, i-silkworms, iQiuji, nemfuyo emithandathu, kunzima ukufumana umntu, ukufunyanwa, ukumangalelwa, ukufudukela kwindlu endala, ukulahleka, ukugula, ukungcwatywa engcwabeni lasentabeni.
